item.description:
North Falmouth to Woods Hole, Falmouth... 10.7 mls one way

http://www.traillink.com/trail/shining-sea-bikeway.aspx

http://www.capecodbikeguide.com/shiningsea.asp

http://www.capecodbikeguide.com/pdf/shining_sea_bikeway_map_2009.pdf

DIRECTIONS: take Route 24 south to 1-495 south to the Bourne Bridge. From points north, take Route 3 south to the Sagamore Bridge rotary. Follow the signs to Buzzards Bay/Falmouth, then cross over the Bourne Bridge. From Bourne Bridge: travel Rt. 28 south to Falmouth. Fork right onto Locust Road Entry to the bikeway parking area is a mile down on the right just past Pin Oak Way. The newer North Falmouth parking area is located on the corner of County Road and Route 151.

Use 13 County Rd as a gps landmark as well, that is where the BikeZone is and across from path.
item.name: Shining Sea Bikeway, Falmouth Cape Cod
